Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REPORTED AND COMMITTED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Establishes the New York student loan assistance and home purchase act
Summary: Establishes the "New York student loan assistance and home purchase act" for the purposes of facilitating the purchase of homes by individuals who are burdened by student debt, by providing financing opportunities for the consolidation of student debt into a mortgage.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing the "New York student loan assistance and home purchase act"
